data.name: Firefight! Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack for "Firefight!", a fast-paced arcade maze runner by Megalithic Mainframe.

The year is 21XX. The evil Flame Gang is terrorizing the city of Neo Alva, trapping hostages within burning buildings. In response, Duck the fire-fighting robot is sent in to rescue the hostages and extinguish the threat of the Flame Gang once and for all!
